Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory245.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'As Hanying dances through the air, the aggressive mechanoid is sent spiraling into the debris behind it in a cloud of smoke. With it, a striking silence ensues.'}
{3: 'Realizing that they stand no chance, the mechanoids scatter in the bat of an eye, leaving not a shred of shadow behind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Those dammed machines... Cough, cough...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'That was very impressive what you did there, young lady. Thank you so much for helping... Cough, cough...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Even through his mask, the Scavenger leader's gut-wrenching coughs are painful to hear."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Sir... are you doing fine there?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying reaches out to support him, but the man waves her off. Still, she holds the man by arm and passes him a handkerchief.'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "Cough... thank you. I just need to let it out. Don't worry about me. I've been like this for quite a few years now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seemingly embarrassed to give the sullied handkerchief back to Hanying, the man nods a few times at her—and shoves the now-yellowed white handkerchief into his own pocket.'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "Judging by your dress, I presume you're from Kowloong? And I see you're traveling with your strange... mechanoid servant?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'No, sir. This mechanoid is my friend.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'A friend? Ah, I see... but what brings a wealthy young lady like you to a rotten place like this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'We happened to pass by here on our way back to Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Back to Kowloong? Well, I guess I know what brought you back here exactly, then...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '...I beg your pardon?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: '...Um, never mind.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Plans to rebuild the Kowloong Metropolis went underway after the Nighter docked.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'You can barely find a living soul in Kowloong now, so they sent out news to encourage people wandering about out there who have left kowloong to come back.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'This is why... Cough, cough... This is why we are heading toward Kowloong, too.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: 'Rebuild the Kowloong Metropolis? But the metropolis leader by the name of Qu is long gone, no?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Qu? Are you referring to Lady Qu who disappeared on the Nighter?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Lady Qu from the Nighter? Who is that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Who else? The exalted grand captain of the Nighter, of course.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Wait, what?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Which means Lord Villier is... dead...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Lord Villier?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Scavengers have no idea who Hanying is talking about, but her tone draws their attention as they all gather around.'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Wait, who are you exactly...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "... My apologies. I was also under Lady Qu's command during my time on the Nighter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "That's why... I haven't managed to correct myself, sorry.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In an attempt to decide whether Hanying can be trusted, the leader vigilantly examines Hanying—before noticing something on her body.'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "That mark on your neck... is a collar, isn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Yes. Specifically, it is a scar left on me when my collar was removed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'That was the only way to break away... from the grasp of the Nighter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "I see... So you were also one of those under Lady Qu's oppression.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Scavenger leader gestures for his companions to ease up.'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'We were forced to wear a cursed collar, thrown overboard when business went south, and even had to live at the mercy of others.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "Sorry about the rant. We took in many survivors abandoned by the Nighter, so we can't help but feel a little tense.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'So I heard from the survivors that Qu had gone poof just like that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Qu is most likely dead, if you ask me... Cough, cough...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Do you know anything else about the Nighter?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "That's all I know. We only just recently made it back from the world outside ourselves.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Have you seen a little child called Yoyo? She's about 15 or 16 and always wears a cape.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "She's my sister, and when I fled the Nighter, I wasn't able to take her with me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "Your little sister? I haven't seen her, unfortunately... Has any of you?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Scavengers behind the leader shake their heads in unison.'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "If you're looking for someone, best to go down to the market by the dock and ask around.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'The Nighter is currently docked just south of the Metropolis, not too far from here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: 'Kowloong Crew from the Nighter has taken command over the ship as well as the city... Cough, cough...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'One of the Scavengers', 3: "Li, it's past five in the morning.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "Then we need to get going. We're severely delayed... but we first need to give our thanks to this lady.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The leader slowly bows to Hanying in appreciation—to whom Hanying quickly returns the gesture.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Don't mention it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scavenger Leader', 3: "We'll be leaving. We'll have to make up for lost time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Safe travels.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The leader waves his hand. Before long, Scavengers resting amongst the debris appear with their bags, climb onto metal trucks of all shapes, and gradually fade into the morning mist.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Spooner', 3: '...You sure know how to get along with humans.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I guess you can say that social skills are one of the things I learned on the Nighter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Sometimes... humans only hear what they want to hear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Spooner', 3: "I guess it didn't strike them that you aren't human.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "That was the basic principle my design was based on... I wouldn't have been able to live on the Nighter as a human otherwise.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying smiles a wry smile.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3501_02.jpg'}
{3: 'The "creator" who gave her her human facade and the basic principle she speaks of has been long gone.'}
{3: 'Even in that last moment in the past, Villier was no longer her goal or principle.'}
{3: 'Amidst the dense fog and heavy clouds, rays of dawn shall shine upon Kowloong.'}
{3: 'Someone once said that the auxiliary towns of Kowloong were not built to keep the outsiders out, but to keep the insiders in.'}
{3: "That which lies ahead might not be what's stopping one from leaving and coming back home, but what lies behind..."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "...Let's go."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory178.png'}
{3: 'To the people of the world, assemble the goods of the land and sea.'}

{3: 'When the Nighter was still traversing the seas, it usually opened for business at night. Today, the market between Kowloong and the Nighter is instead the most lively during the day and rather desolate at night.'}
{3: "Bare-chested workers carrying all sorts of goods walk among Blubbers that carry steel and cement—a common sight in today's Kowloong."}

{3: 'A stand with a neon sign that reads "Home Appliance Repair Service" sits beside a rice noodle roll and congee stall. The large wooden stacked steamer at its door front spews out steam with an irresistible savory smell, attracting passersby from all directions.'}
{3: 'Even in the age when automation is capable of producing any delicacy, these street-side Kowloong chefs insist on hand-making their food.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Stall Owner', 3: 'Morning, what would you like?', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: 'The stall owner speaks to a customer stopping by while he lifts the giant lid of the stacked steamer, sending a cloud of steam with meat and dough fragrance that inundates the customer in a suit.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hum... three char siu buns, one soy milk, and... got any rice noodle rolls left?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Stall Owner', 3: 'Sure do. You, over there! A dish of rice noodle rolls!', 4: '1'}

{3: 'The owner seems utterly uninterested in the identity of his customer. He takes a wooden fork and skillfully picks up three white buns and drops them onto a plate before passing it to the woman.'}
{2: 'Stall Owner', 3: 'Soy milk is over there. Help yourself. That will be nine Grubs. Hey, where are the rice noodle rolls?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Server', 3: 'Coming! Be right there!'}
{3: 'A boy also in an apron emerges from the back of the humble little stall and operates the drawers at the back with equal dexterity.'}

{3: 'The customer digs into her pocket and counts out nine Grubs before slipping them into the time-worn coin box. The owner pays no attention to the payment, focusing instead on making the next batch of buns perfect.'}
{3: 'With a plate of buns in her hand, the customer takes a sip of the soy milk before lowering her head to pass through the doorway curtains and into the stall supported by simple planks.'}

{3: 'On the wall hangs a paper banner with the words "Unimaginably Delicious Breakfast". The words are powerfully written, but after seeing the large "Qu" stamped at the end, one can\'t help but wonder about the authenticity of the work.'}
{3: 'But who cares? That is of no relevance when there is a bowl of delicious delicacy in front of you.'}
{3: 'A few table sets are scattered throughout the stall, with people enjoying breakfast on their stools.'}
{3: 'The new customer pulls a stool over without reserve and sits down by the last empty table.'}
{2: 'Server', 3: "Here's your rice noodle rolls."}
{3: 'The boy swiftly puts down the plate of food before disappearing back into the kitchen.'}

{3: "Time is of the essence when making this special—remove it from the heat a tad too late and it'll go dry, but you end up with snow-white sheets that are less than perfect if you steam it for longer than a minute."}

{3: 'After taking it out from the steamer, cut the sheet into strips before adding a special blend of soy sauce—and there you have a dish with a simple rice fragrance topped with a salty spice, which is one of the best delicacies of Kowloong.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Let's give it a try... Umm, this is exactly what I've been looking for!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'A compliment for the food is a compliment to the chef, although the chef is too busy to listen to what she has to say.'}
{3: 'A man also enjoying his food at the next table, however, catches the heartfelt compliment.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Customer', 3: 'I know, right? Breakfast here really is one of the best.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Agreed. It's been too long since I last had a wonderful breakfast like this...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Customer', 3: "Looks like you're not from around here? You ordered quite a lot... buns and rice noodle rolls and all.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Oh? Well, I just got back after a long night's journey.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The woman answers with a mouth full of food.'}
{2: '???', 3: "I don't believe I've had the pleasure.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "Oh. I'm just a worker from the city.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "Name's Duheng—here on business.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man lets out a bright smile and points toward Kowloong with his chopsticks.'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "...I've been away for many years. So much has changed since then.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "For sure. In the past, we didn't even dare think about getting off the ship, let alone going home.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "Work might have become a little tougher, but life is much better now that I'm back with the brothers.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Did you use to live on the Nighter?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: 'Yep. Grew up on the ship and been working on many construction projects with the crew since I was a child.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "We've been busy rebuilding the city ever since the Nighter docked.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Oh? Are we allowed into the city now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "Yeah. Oh, you're worried about the Punishing, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: 'Before the Nighter docked, Kowloong Crew managed to acquire a few CPF cores and had them installed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "And Pulao Crew has grown in number. Didn't you see them on your way here?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'You mean the Pulao Crew just outside the market?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "Pulao Crew is probably the largest group under Kowloong Crew now. It's still not that big, but all of us depend on them for our safety.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Another wave of steam rushes into the stall. Under the stall owner's careful watch, the next batch of buns is ready."}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "I didn't see that many of them, though. I only saw a handful on my way here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: 'You never know what might happen, eh? Anyway, a secure life like this is more than good enough for me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The worker pulls out a piece of tissue from his pocket, wipes his mouth, and puts on the helmet lying beside his arm.'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: 'Gotta head back to work now. Enjoy the rest of your meal.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The doorway curtains draw open as the man going out passes by another breakfast customer coming in.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Stall Owner', 3: 'What can I get... Ahem... Morning, Lord Chaofeng. W-what can I do for you? Or... would you like something to eat?'}
{3: 'As the word "Chaofeng" comes out of the stall owner\'s mouth, the rest of the stall tenses up—save for the woman in the suit who just came in.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Don't mind me. I'm just here for a quick chat with someone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Stall Owner', 3: 'Got it... Do make yourself comfortable, then.'}
{3: 'When Chaofeng finally draws the drapes open and enters the stall, the other customers suddenly seem in a hurry. They quickly finish their food and rush out.'}
{3: "Until all that's left of the lively stall is the crackling fire from the furnace, the sound of flowing water and someone chewing."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Look at you munching on your food.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "What? Can't even have a proper meal now, can I?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "You're the one who said to meet in the morning, and you're just here taking your time eating?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Boy... this is good.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chaofeng lets out a deep sigh as he pushes away an empty plate.'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "Bread and coffee for breakfast just won't cut it. Nothing beats what we have in Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Done? Can we go now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Go? Where to?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Where else? You aren't going to make us talk about work here, are you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Is there a problem? Might as well, since you just sent everyone escaping the moment you walked in.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing no alternative, Chaofeng does a little stretch and lets the woman have it her way.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Alright.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'So, why are you back from Babylonia?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'For Kowloong, of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: '...Why, though? Did Babylonia say anything?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Nothing noteworthy. Nothing except they want to have their cake and eat it, too.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Duheng gently caresses the edge of the plate in front of her, all the while keeping her gaze fixated on Chaofeng.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Kowloong is not their back garden.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "To some people, the value of Kowloong's vast lands doesn't just lie in its city.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'But then again, not everyone is on that boat. There are people who are willing to help us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: '...On what condition?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'That I do not know yet, but the higher-ups have made their intentions clear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "Many from Babylonia's congress care for nothing more than the tea parties after their routine meetings on Friday afternoons.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "But for me, for us, the goal of politics is to ensure the survival of humans, and Kowloong's future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'For you?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Even through Chaofeng's mask, Duheng could sense the sarcasm in the tone of the question."}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "Not you? That's unfortunate. So you weren't the moral vacuum you are now back then when we worked so hard for our dear Villy on the Nighter?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "I'm no congressperson, though.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Now I have but one goal—to ensure the survival of the last of Kowloong.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'We cannot count on any promises made by outsiders. We only have ourselves to trust.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'I assume I\'m included in the "we" you speak of?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Sure, if you want to see it that way.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "Looks like I'll have to prove myself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Duheng takes out a document from her suitcase and hands it over to Chaofeng.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "What's this?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Take a look.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Another surge of heated vapor rushes in. Without the lively interaction of customers and staff, tense, oppressive silence takes over the space.'}
{3: 'When Chaofeng finishes scanning over the files, he breaks the silence in an even more depressing tone.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: '...Is this for real?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Sure. Have I ever lied to you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Where did you get this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "I've got my own intelligence network, like how you have yours", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'But the information on this document originated in Kowloong.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'Then I guess there must be an all-knowing operative in Kowloong, no?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Do you even believe what you just said?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "There isn't a soul inside the city now except those in the Observatory, and they do nothing but watch over the graves.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "You've met them?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'I have no business with them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'They rejected us right off the bat, so I refuse to try and suck up to them again.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'And as for the "real" Lady Qu...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chaofeng hesitates for a second before continuing in a decisive tone.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Disappeared a long time ago, right? After what happened at the Metropolis, no one has ever seen "Lady Qu".', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before Duheng continues, the curtains are drawn open once more. A Kowloong Crew barges into the stall.'}
{3: 'Chaofeng closes the files in his hands without a word.'}
{2: 'Kowloong Crew', 3: 'L—Lord Chaofeng!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Slow down. What's going on?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The crew member casts a suspicious glance at Duheng across the table and swallows his words.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Don't mind her.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kowloong Crew', 3: "Some of our guys on guard at the dock told us that they'd caught someone trying to board the ship right by the third gangway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "That happens every day. What's all the fuss? Question them thoroughly, let them walk free if there's nothing suspicious, and toss them out if there is.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Kowloong Crew', 3: "That's what we usually do, but this one's a bit tricky... She said her name was Hanying. She's got no identification, and when we questioned her, she said that she wanted to see someone by the name of Yoyo.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Hanying? Geez, where have I heard that name...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Duheng', 3: "Who's that? Someone you know?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Not exactly. More like someone else's familiar, but I thought she was dead?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "It's not uncommon for someone to come back from the dead in Kowloong folklore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'So you believe in God?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: "Actually, I don't.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Anyhow, I'll go deal with it. And you, take this person down to the Nighter's orlop.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "She doesn't have our identification either, so go and get her registered first. Once you're down at the orlop, just follow her orders.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kowloong Crew', 3: '...Understood.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The suffocating moisture once again fills the empty little eatery.'}
{2: 'Duheng', 3: 'I think that should make me one of "us" now, no?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory168.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In a makeshift stall at Kowloong Crew base, Hanying is staring at the end of a pole that has rusted from a lack of maintenance...'}
{3: "While reminiscing all that's happened over the past 20 years."}
{3: 'She and the ship have forgotten each other amidst the world of turmoil.'}
{3: 'People gather like a group of resilient ants on the ruins of Kowloong, rebuilding a life for themselves—all the while unaware of what the future might hold...'}
{1: '1', 3: "The heavy metal door opens and closes as Chaofeng enters the room, cutting off Hanying's train of thought."}
{3: 'The awkward exchange of greetings entails nothing but awkward silence.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "So, you're Hanying?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Correct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I used to be a dancer on the Nighter, but I...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Attempted to assassinate the leader—but failed and died.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying nods in silence.'}
{3: 'In that upheaval twenty years ago, Hanying\'s attempt on the life of Villier—or "Lady Qu"— was not out of her own volition.'}
{3: 'At least in that moment, the truth was a secret only between her and Yoyo.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I understand that it's too late now, but I still want to express that, at that time... I did not have a choice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'I know. We got to the bottom of that, and Yazi has told us everything.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'He died a few years ago, but judging from your reaction, none of this is news to you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I came across a Scavenger outside the market who informed me of the current state of the Nighter and Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Everything is as you see it.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chaofeng nods.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'So, from what we know, the mechanoid by the name of Hanying removed her collar without permission and died twenty years ago.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "No mechanoid could've survived after enduring such a powerful shock from a pulse.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Indeed, I've had the same thought myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I seem to have been adrift in a dream ever since that day. Until... I was recently awakened by my companions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Companions?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "That is beside the point. What's important is that I am the same Hanying.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chaofeng notices that Hanying is withholding some information but decides not to press for it.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Anyhow, I am not at all interested in how you "revived." Nothing seems impossible in this age and time after all.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'All I need to know is why you have returned to the Nighter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'I need to make sure you will not pose any danger to Kowloong or the Nighter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'For Yoyo.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying answers without the slightest hesitation.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I came back to fulfill my promise to Yoyo.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: '...You mean Pulao?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Yoyo has become Pulao?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'After the assassination attempt, she was accepted into the Dragon Children.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Pulao secretly lets you off the ship after the incident. Well played, indeed, but I never fell for that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I see... So where is she now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: '...Pulao is not on the Nighter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Four days ago, Pulao led a team into the mountains northwest of the Metropolis and has yet to return.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Wait, what?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'They went to investigate the recent disappearance of some Kowloong residents but vanished themselves...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Shouldn't you send people over to find out what's going on?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Startled by her question, Chaofeng pauses, and the muffled noises down by the port suddenly grow audible.'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "You don't think I did? Except everyone I sent after them disappeared without a trace, too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "We would have loved to do more, but I can't put people's lives on the line when our life here on the land grows in size by the day.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying cannot guess the expression Chaofeng is wearing behind his mask.'}
{3: 'In the past, being on the seas kept one safe from the Punishing. People living on land now make do with the remaining equipment and supplies, and the CPFs that they got through overseas trade.'}
{3: "But regardless of how many there are on the ship, it's just a drop in the ocean for Kowloong."}
{3: 'In this lonesome city, every Kowloong soul is worth saving.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Apologies... But knowing Yoyo, I guess she would do the same if she were in your place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Your understanding is greatly appreciated.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "To be honest, though, you're part of why she left for the mountains.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'Before she left with her team, she made a trip to the prison to see the mastermind behind the assassination.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaofeng', 3: 'The hacker by the name of... "The Cradle".', 4: '2'}
